entry.title: 30+ Corona Quotes To Make You Feel Positive
entry.summary:
Coronavirus changed our lives like we never thought and affects all people. There are corona quotes that will help you to change your negativity to positivity.

Also see: Cricket Quotes

Motivational Sports Quotes

Some young people think they're invincible - this virus definitely does affect people my age.

The danger which …
entry.content:
Coronavirus changed our lives like we never thought and affects all people. There are corona quotes that will help you to change your negativity to positivity.

Also see: Cricket Quotes

Motivational Sports Quotes

Some young people think they're invincible - this virus definitely does affect people my age.

The danger which is least expected soonest comes to us. - Voltaire

The safety of the people shall be the highest law. Marcus Tullius Cicero

I seriously can't wait for the day where they announce that coronavirus is gone and we can all go back to normal.

COVID-19 will reshape our world. We don't yet know when the crisis will end. But we can be sure that by the time it does, our world will look very different. - Josep Borrell

Nothing is of greater importance than the conservation of human life. - Former U.S. President Calvin Coolidge

Tough times never last, tough people do.

Thank you for putting yourself in the way of danger to save others, to save the public. This is what it means to be a hero. This is what it means to build a beautiful legacy. Thank you for everything.

Corona Quotes for Safety

Let's stay at home be safe

Stay home don't panic, beat the pandemic.

Stay at home if you have a high temperature and a cough.

Stay home stay safe & wash your hands.

There is nothing that gives more assurance than a Mask. - Colette

Corona Quotes for Instagram

Everything will be ok

We can Beat if Together

Make corona our reset button

While we are panicking about COVID-19, Mother earth is healing.

I want to live I stay Home

Stay positive

Coronavirus Lockdown Quotes

7 Days of Social Distancing: Struck up a conversation with a spider today. Seems nice. He's a web designer.

When this quarantine is over, lets not tell some people.

Mom, this cocial distancing thing is awesome. I don't have to wear pants at all this month!

Coronavirus Quotes Funny

I'm not buying a 2021 planner until i see a trailer

Eventually, everyone will be quarantined to their houses with no sports to watch...and in 9 months from now, a boom of babies will be born...and we will call them Coronials.

It took a pandemic to make people realize that the only solution to any problem is avoiding people.

Don't you hate how you can be sleepy and then not be able to go to sleep.

This Corona Virus has a very big egi. It will not Come to your house unless you go out and Invite it.

Is there realy anything new in this New Year???

Wake me up when Corona ends.

I SWEAR, we are fighting two pandemics: Coronavirus and Stupidity.

The Corona virus won't last long because it was made in China.

Next

entry.title: 60+ Impressive Failure Quotes That Will Change Your Life
entry.summary:
Failure is the most important part of our life. Some peoples accept it and compromise with their life and goals. On the other side, some peoples learn from their failures and keep trying until they get success. There are some motivational failure quotes from famous successful and great peoples.

Also …
entry.content:
Failure is the most important part of our life. Some peoples accept it and compromise with their life and goals. On the other side, some peoples learn from their failures and keep trying until they get success. There are some motivational failure quotes from famous successful and great peoples.

Also see: Love for Football Quotes

Inspiring Badminton Quotes

If you fail, never give up because F.A.I.L. means "first Attempt In Learning" - A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever. - Lance Armstrong

Losers quit when they fail. Winners fail until they succeed. - Unknown

I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying. - Michael Jordan

I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. - Michael Jordan

I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed. - Michael Jordan

I've never been afraid to fail. - Michael Jordan

I have failed at times, but I never stop trying. - Rahul Dravid

I have failed more times than I have succeeded, but I never gave up, and will never give up, till my last breath, and that’s what cricket has taught me. - Yuvraj Singh

Every man’s got to figure to get beat sometimes. - Joe Louis

You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it. - Lionel Messi

There is no such thing as failure. Failure is just life trying to move us in another direction. - Oprah Winfrey

It is impossible to live without failing at something unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default. - JK Rowling

Failure is not falling down but refusing to get up. - Chinese proverb

Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough. - Og Mandion

The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times. - Paulo Coelho

Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try. - Jack Canfield

I have not failed, I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work. - Thomas Alva Edison

You don’t learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over. - Richard Branson

All people fail at certain instances in their lives, the only thing that makes them different is how they manage to stand up or how they choose to fail again. - Unknown

If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original. - Ken Robinson

Giving up is the only sure way to fail. - Gena Showalter

Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing. - Denis Waitley

Fear of Failure Quotes

If you get No as an answer, remember N.O. means "Next Opportunity" - A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

Fear regret more than failure. - Taryn Rose

There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure. - Paulo Coelho

Successful people don’t fear failure but understand that it’s necessary to learn and grow from. - Robert Kiyosaki

You can't be afraid to fail. It's the only way you succeed - you're not gonna succeed all the time, and I know that. - LeBron James

The topic of leadership is a touchy one. A lot of leaders fail because they don't have the bravery to touch that nerve or strike that chord. Throughout my years, I haven't had that fear. - Kobe Bryant

If you're afraid to fail, then you're probably going to fail. - Kobe Bryant

I have self-doubt. I have insecurity. I have fear of failure. I have nights when I show up at the arena and I'm like, 'My back hurts, my feet hurt, my knees hurt. I don't have it. I just want to chill.' We all have self-doubt. You don't deny it, but you also don't capitulate to it. You embrace it. - Kobe Bryant

Successful Failure Quotes

End is not the end, if fact E.N.D. means "Effort Never Dies" - A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

If you are afraid of failure, you don’t deserve to be successful. - Charles Barkley

Courage allows the successful woman to fail and learn powerful lessons from the failure. So that in the end, she didn’t fail at all. - Maya Angelou

Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable. - Coco Chanel

Success or failure is caused more by mental attitude than by mental capacity. - Walter Scott

It’s fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure. - Bill Gates

Next

entry.title: 60+ Basketball Quotes That Will Motivate You To Keep Trying
entry.summary:
Looking for popular Basketball quotes by famous players to motivate you to get to your goals. These quotes about life, dream, attitude, failure, keep practice and playing.

Also see: Motivation Sports Quotes

Hiking Quotes to stay motivated

There is no such thing as a perfect basketball player, and I don …
entry.content:
Looking for popular Basketball quotes by famous players to motivate you to get to your goals. These quotes about life, dream, attitude, failure, keep practice and playing.

Also see: Motivation Sports Quotes

Hiking Quotes to stay motivated

There is no such thing as a perfect basketball player, and I don’t believe there is only one greatest player either. - Michael Jordan

Basketball is a lifelong game. You continue to learn from the game day in and day out, and all along the way, you get better. - Scottie Pippen

Ask not what your teammates can do for you. Ask what you can do for your teammates. - Magic Johnson

Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there. - John Wooden

I gave everything I had to basketball. The passion is still there, but the desire to play is not. It was a great ride. - Allen Iverson

Great players are willing to give up their own personal achievement for the achievement of the group. It enhances everybody. - Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

There is a lot of basketball beyond our control, but a player should never let anyone try harder than he does. - Dean Smith

Once you are labeled the best you want to stay up there, and you can’t do it by loafing around. If I don’t keep changing, I’m history. - Larry Bird

Create unselfishness as the most important team attribute. - Bill Russell

Nothing is given. Everything is earned. - LeBron James

You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good. - Jerry West

When you’re not practicing, someone else is getting better. - Allen Iverson

Push yourself again and again. Don’t give an inch until the final buzzer sounds. - Larry Bird

What do you do with a mistake: recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it. - Dean Smith

Basketball Quotes by Players

There are some more quotes by famous football players that encourage us to never accept our failure and keep trying until we get what we want.

Michael Jordan

Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.

I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.

Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.

I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come.

I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.

There is no 'i' in team but there is in win.

Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.

To be successful you have to be selfish, or else you never achieve. And once you get to your highest level, then you have to be unselfish. Stay reachable. Stay in touch. Don't isolate.

In reality, I never want to grow up.

As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's 'come, stop, come, stop.' There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.

I won't have any competitive instincts in any sports, other than golf. I can't see being competitive in sports any more.

I wasn't really a work-conscious type of person. I was a player. I loved to play sports.

Kobe Bryant

If you're afraid to fail, then you're probably going to fail.

I have self-doubt. I have insecurity. I have fear of failure. I have nights when I show up at the arena and I'm like, 'My back hurts, my feet hurt, my knees hurt. I don't have it. I just want to chill.' We all have self-doubt. You don't deny it, but you also don't capitulate to it. You embrace it.

Winning takes precedence over all. There's no gray area. No almosts.

People just don't understand how obsessed I am with winning.

LeBron James

I treated it like every day was my last day with a basketball.

Basketball is my passion, I love it. But my family and friends mean everything to me. That's what's important. I need my phone so I can keep in contact with them at all times.

I played football for a team called the East Dragons on the east side of town. We only had six regular season games. And six games I played tail back and I had 18 touchdowns in six games. That's when I knew I had some athletic ability.

It's always a struggle growing up in Akron.

If a great opportunity opens itself up, I would love to be involved... or star in a movie.

I'm confident with my ability.

Stephen Curry

It's crazy how fast you get out of shape if you miss a couple days of action.

I know the blessing of having a dad who played 16 years in the league. That experience, and seeing him as an example, let me know that it's possible. It's not easy, but it's possible.

When I step forward on the floor, I have the confidence that I'm the best player playing that night and that I am the most prepared at what I need to be doing.

I know what I do for my team and what my teammates expect of me on both ends of the floor.

In college, a loss is pretty devastating. That feeling kind of goes away in an 82-game season. You hate to lose, but you also have a lot more games to make up for it.

I always have confidence, whether I miss four in a row or make four in a row, that the next one's going in. To a coach, sometimes that might not make sense.

Most of the stuff I try in a game, in the moment, I have supreme confidence I'm going to execute it.

To be able to finish opportunities that I do get in the paint, that makes a difference.

Basketball is booming, and it's not just an Under Armour standpoint: it's about the game itself. Kids going out and playing and being inspired by what we do on the court.

There's a reason that I have confidence out there, and it's about how I prepare for games and for series and seasons and whatnot, so we've got to stick with that kind of thought process.

Derrick Rose

The hard part that I had to go through in life, period, is living in poverty and not being able to get what I want.

My mom is real passionate and a family-first woman. She always told me that just because I can shoot a basketball better than someone else, I shouldn't think that I'm better than them. I know if I change, my friends and family would lay me down. She just wants to see her kids do right.

My days shouldn't be hard because I'm doing what I'm doing and that's playing basketball.

Basketball Quotes for Instagram

Some wish for it, we work for it.

You can’t control the minutes you play, but you can control how you play the minutes you get.

If you ain’t hurting, you ain’t playing hard enough.

Nobody trains to be backup.

When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.

Teamwork makes the dream work.

Basketball doesn’t build character. It reveals it.

Winners don’t wait for chances, they take them.

Winners train; losers complain.

Play til the clock says 0:00

All things are difficult before they are easy.

One spirit, one team, one win.

Defend until the end.

All’s fair in love and basketball – Love & Basketball.

Next

entry.title: Inspiring Badminton Quotes : Inspirational, Motivational and Instagram
entry.summary:
Best motivational and Inspirational Badminton quotes. To inspire you for it. Share them on Instagram or with your friends. These quotes will motivate you for your goals.

Quotes About Badminton

A champion has to be disciplined by practicing regularly in the right manner, respect coaches and most importantly ought to …
entry.content:
Best motivational and Inspirational Badminton quotes. To inspire you for it. Share them on Instagram or with your friends. These quotes will motivate you for your goals.

Quotes About Badminton

A champion has to be disciplined by practicing regularly in the right manner, respect coaches and most importantly ought to have self-belief. - Saina Nehwal

Badminton is like ballet dancing. It requires a lot of control, strength, mind play and measured movement. - Aamir Khan

Those who play badminton well take decisions quickly. - Dmitry Medvedev

Only a shuttler knows how demanding the fastest sport in the world is. - Tiyasha

Your dream will always defeat reality if you give it chance.

Ability is what you’re capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

Discipline is the bridge between your badminton goals and badminton success.

Your dream will always defeat reality if you give it chance.

Badminton Love Quotes

When I am playing badminton there are only two people in the world, myself and my opponent. - Erland Kops

Choosing a badminton goal and sticking to it changes everything.

When badminton was accepted into the Barcelona Olympic Games it showed that there was an acceptance of my sport internationally. - Rhonda Cator

I would say that it is the explosiveness that I possess in my game. Like a crouching tiger waiting to pounce on it preys. - Lee Chong Wei

In badminton, they use a lot from the wrist. But I use a lot from the shoulder. - Li Na

Badminton Quotes For Instagram

Life is a game, Badminton is serious.

Keep calm and play badminton.

If we dare to win, we should also dare to lose. - Lee Chong Wei

It’s not the hours you put in….it’s what you put in those hours.

Talk with your racquet, play with your heart.

Champions keep playing until they get it right.

Are you fast enough to handle a badminton shuttle?

Badminton: Too Fast too Furious.

Badminton is not as glamorous as cricket. - Saina Nehwal

Hit me with your best shot.

Hustle and hit and never quit.

Next

entry.title: Famous Archery Quotes You Want To Know
entry.summary:
Archery is not just a bow and arrow. It is much more than that. It's as old as mankind. It teaches us to be the focus and patient in our life. Below you can find some famous archery quotes to inspire you.

Archery Inspirational Quotes

The history of the bow …
entry.content:
Archery is not just a bow and arrow. It is much more than that. It's as old as mankind. It teaches us to be the focus and patient in our life. Below you can find some famous archery quotes to inspire you.

Archery Inspirational Quotes

The history of the bow and arrow is the history of mankind. - Fred Bear

Archery does not get difficult or hard to understand until the arrow misses. - Milan E. Elott

A good archer is known not by his arrows but by his aim. - Thomas Fuller

The worst thing is to try to shoot as well as your previous shot. - Unknown

Archery is a feeling you can’t explain. - Unknown

It’s not about being the best. It’s about being better than you were yesterday. - Unknown

But you must be patient and careful; nor should you expect to become an accomplished archer without long and severe training. - Maurice Thompson

The archer that shoots badly has a lie ready. - Spanish Proverb

Nothing clears a troubled mind better than shooting a bow. - Fred Bear

You have to relax when you’re shooting an arrow. You can’t be tense. And that just helps, in your day-to-day life. - Stephen Amell

Whether you are a beginning, intermediate, or even advanced archer, Archery will give you something that’s almost impossible to find elsewhere. - Usa Archery

Other archers are not my competition. I stand with them, not against them. - Unknown

An arrow is never afraid of shooting from the bow; but it is afraid of not reaching the target! - Mehmet Murat ildan

Even as the archer loves the arrow that flies, so too he loves the bow that remains constant in his hands. - Nigerian Proverb

I shoot an arrow into the air, where it lands I do not care: I get my arrows wholesale! - Curly Howard

Short Archery Quotes for Instagram

Draw not your bow till your arrow is fixed. - English Proverbs

In the long run, you only hit what you aim at. - Henry Thoreau

I don’t wear bows. I shoot them. - Unknown

Archery requires very sensitive muscles. - Im Dong-Hyun

No shot is hard to make, it’s just easier to miss. - Unknown

Forget the last arrow only the next will count. - Unknown

If you don’t shoot you don’t understand. - Unknown

Archery is not just a sports. Its a life skill. - Unknown

Keep Calm and Shoot Straight. - Unknown

There is no excellence in archery without great labour. - Maurice Thompson

An archer cannot hit the bullseye if he doesn’t know where the target is. - Unknown

Don’t shoot fast. Shoot good. - Unknown

Next

entry.title: The best 25+ swimming quotes that you will love
entry.summary:
Swimming is a full-body workout that's why it has great benefits for our health. Here are some best swimming quotes that will help inspire you for it.

Inspirational Swimming Quotes

The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it. - Woodrow Wilson

A huge part of swimming …
entry.content:
Swimming is a full-body workout that's why it has great benefits for our health. Here are some best swimming quotes that will help inspire you for it.

Inspirational Swimming Quotes

The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it. - Woodrow Wilson

A huge part of swimming for me is I love it, and it is so much fun. - Missy Franklin

When you prepare for something, it's like jumping into cold water, but you're prepared. You jump in. And you start swimming, or if you don't swim, you drown. - Rza

The water is your friend…..you don’t have to fight with water, just share the same spirit as the water, and it will help you move. - Alexander Popov

I was so surprised. Then again, I was so relaxed in the water, it felt amazing. - Pieter van den Hoogenband

A huge part of swimming for me is I love it, and it is so much fun. - Missy Franklin

The water doesn’t know how old you are. - Dara Torres

I'm just a simple guy swimming in a sea of sharks. - Don Johnson

Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm swimming, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is. - Demetri Martin

I concentrate on preparing to swim my race and let the other swimmers think about me, not me about them. - Amanda Beard

Funny Swimming Quotes

Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked. - Warren Buffett

I have often wanted to drown my troubles, but I can't get my wife to go swimming. - Jimmy Carter

we swim because we are too sexy for a sport that requires clothes.

It's amazing how I spend most of my day half-naked, around everyone and it's just NATURAL.

Always behave like a duck. Keep calm and unruffled on the surface, but paddle like hell underwater.

I don't have to swim faster than the shark. I just need to swim faster than you.

If swimming is so good for your figure, how do you explain whales?

Swimming Pools Quotes

We don't swim in your toilet, so don't pee in our pool

This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is. - Dennis Rodman

I think everybody pees in the pool. It's kind of a normal thing to do for swimmers. - Michael Phelps

This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is. - Dennis Rodman

No one learns to swim in the shallow end of the pool.

Quotes by Michael Phelps

If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.

You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.

Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.

It's cool just because I've had this dream of changing the sport of swimming and it's finally happening.

If I didn't swim my best, I'd think about it at school, at dinner, with my friends. It would drive me crazy.

I have the opportunity to be part of swimming history. To take the sport to a new level would be an honor for me. There's no better time to try this than now.

I want to continue the sport of swimming. I'm not going to give up until I think it's reached where I want it to go.

Next

entry.title: Most Powerful Sports Quotes for Motivation
entry.summary: Sports are the most important part of our life. We all play many sports in our life. Some are for fun or others find their life in it. While doing that sometimes we need to get the motivation to play more or to overcome our failure. For those time sports …
entry.content:
Sports are the most important part of our life. We all play many sports in our life. Some are for fun or others find their life in it. While doing that sometimes we need to get the motivation to play more or to overcome our failure. For those time sports quotes for motivation make a lot of help. With them, we get motivation and learn that failure is just part of success. Sometimes we just need to do hard work and never ever quit trying.

Sports Quotes for Motivation

There may be people that have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do. – Derek Jeter

To uncover your true potential you must first find your own limits and then you have to have the courage to blow past them. – Picabo Street

It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters. – Evander Holyfield

It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up. – Vince Lombardi

Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding. – Jim Valvano

You can’t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get. – Michael Phelps

Champions keep playing until they get it right. – Billie Jean King

I never worry about the problem. I worry about the solution. – Shaquille O’Neal

I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat. – Tom Landry

He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life. – Muhammad Ali

You can motivate by fear, and you can motivate by reward. But both those methods are only temporary. The only lasting thing is self motivation. – Homer Rice

Playing Sports Quotes

Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard. – Tim Notke

Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion. – Michael Jordan

Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period. – Lou Holtz

Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will. – Mahatma Gandhi

I became a good pitcher when I stopped trying to make them miss the ball and started trying to make them hit it. – Sandy Koufax

Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play. – Mike Singletary

Success is where preparation and opportunity meet. – Bobby Unser

It is more difficult to stay on top than to get there. – Mia Hamm

Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind. – Jackie Joyner-Kersee

We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated. – Maya Angelou

Sports Lover Quotes

Stubbornness usually is considered a negative; but I think that trait has been a positive for me.- Cal Ripken, Jr.

Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do. – John Wooden

It’s not the will to win that matters — everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters. – Paul “Bear” Bryant

An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head. – Emil Zatopek

Your talent is God’s gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God. – Unknown

Sports Quotes About Winning

The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital. – Joe Paterno

It’s not the will to win that matters — everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters. – Paul “Bear” Bryant

I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. – Michael Jordan

A champion is someone who gets up when he can’t. – Jack Dempsey

It isn’t the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe. – Muhammad Ali

Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you. – Arnold Palmer

If a team wants to intimidate you physically and you let them, they’ve won. – Mia Hamm

The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination. – Tommy Lasorda

Sports Quotes About Confidence

Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up. – Dean Karnazes

Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is. – Vince Lombardi

When you’ve got something to prove, there’s nothing greater than a challenge. – Terry Bradshaw

If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it. – Ronnie Lott

Sports do not build character. They reveal it. – Heywood Broun

You have to be at your strongest when you’re feeling at your weakest. – Unknown

Sports Quotes Failure

I’ve failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. – Michael Jordan

If you fail to prepare, you’re prepared to fail. – Mark Spitz

You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take. – Wayne Gretzky

Winners never quit and quitters never win. – Vince Lombardi

What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose. – Andre Agassi

If you are afraid of failure you don’t deserve to be successful! – Charles Barkley

Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement. – Matt Biondi

Sports Quotes Short

Make each day your masterpiece. – John Wooden

It never gets easier. You just get better. – Jordan Hoechlin

It ain’t over ’til it’s over. – Yogi Berra

You’re never a loser until you quit trying. – Mike Ditka

Success trains. Failure complains. – Unknown

Next

entry.title: 20+ love for football quotes
entry.summary: Some people think football as a sport. But it's much more than that. In our life You need to look, you need to think, you need to move, you need to find space, you need to help others. Same goes to Football. Below you get some quotes to express your …
entry.content:
Some people think football as a sport. But it's much more than that. In our life You need to look, you need to think, you need to move, you need to find space, you need to help others. Same goes to Football. Below you get some quotes to express your love for football. Share them with your friends and families.

Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I assure you, it's much more serious than that. - Bill Shankly

I once cried because i had no shoes to play football, with my friends, but one day i saw a man who had no feet, and i realized how rich i am. - Zinedine zidane

Football is a game of mistakes. Whoever makes the fewest mistakes wins. - Johan Cruyff

Whenever you enjoy it, you always play the best football. - Karen Carney

Football is unconditional love. - Tom Brady

I learnt All about life with a ball at my feet. - ronaldinho

Playing with your feet is one thing. Play with your heart is another.

Football is God's gift to humanity.

In football, everything is possible, from the moment you work and you believe in your qualities. - Kylian Mbappe

There's two times of year for me: Football season, and waiting for football season. Darius Rucker

Football Quotes Motivational

Football was always my dream. I started playing at the age of five, and I'm still playing now. - Sadio Mane

Loyalty is a big part of football, and it shows if you are a real man or not. - Jack Wilshere

I'm very proud because, all my life, I worked very hard to be a football player. - Fabio Cannavaro

Football's always been cerebral. The most important thing is thinking fast. - Thiago Alcantara

Football is a team sport and not an individual sport. We win as a team, and every individual is better if we are part of the team. - Fernando Torres

In football, the worst things are excuses. Excuses mean you cannot grow or move forward. - Pep Guardiola

Football Quotes Inspirational

Football runs in my blood, and I did really want to play football. - Radamel Falcao

To me it was never about what I accomplished on the football field, it was about the way I played the game. Jerry Rice

I am not a dreamer. I am a football romantic. - Jurgen Klopp

It's like everything in football - and life. You need to look, you need to think, you need to move, you need to find space, you need to help others. It's very simple in the end. - Johan Cruyff

Football is a fertility festival. Eleven sperm trying to get into the egg. I feel sorry for the goalkeeper. Bjork

Next

entry.title: Hiking Quotes to Stay Motivated on Your Journey
entry.summary:
The best thing about hiking is we come to mountains and nature. We leave all the noise and pollution to feel the happiness. Here are the some hiking quotes to stay motivated on your journey and inspire your to hiking more.

Motivational Hiking Quotes for Keep Going

If you’re …
entry.content:
The best thing about hiking is we come to mountains and nature. We leave all the noise and pollution to feel the happiness. Here are the some hiking quotes to stay motivated on your journey and inspire your to hiking more.

Motivational Hiking Quotes for Keep Going

If you’re going through hell, keep going. – Winston Churchill

I had once again proven that again alone, I was again enough. – Aspen Matis

For hiking is one of those things that you can only do when you have the determination in you. – Unknown

If you fell down yesterday, stand up today. – H. G. Wells

Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it’s always your choice. – Wayne Dyer

Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence – Helen Keller

I would never have started this trip if I had known how tough it was, but I couldn’t and wouldn’t quit – Ben Montgomery

Best Hiking Quotes with Friends

Speed is not a priority, just enjoy your hike – Keep smile. – Barry Perdana Putra

You need mountains, long staircases don’t make good hikers. – Amit Kalantri

Traveling shouldn’t be just a tour, it should be a tale. – Amit Kalantri

Travel teaches as much as a teacher. – Amit Kalantri

Mountains make me believe that nothing can be bigger than nature, not even human ego. – Jay Kumar Singh

Every mountain has its soul… if the mountain does not accept you & you don’t submit to her will, she will destroy you. – Bernadette McDonald

Returning home is the most difficult part of long-distance hiking; You have grown outside the puzzle and your piece no longer fits. – Cindy Ross

I love going out of my way, beyond what I know, and finding my way back a few extra miles, by another trail, with a compass that argues with the map…nights alone in motels in remote western towns where I know no one and no one I know knows where I am, nights with strange paintings and floral spreads and cable television that furnish a reprieve from my own biography, when in Benjamin’s terms, I have lost myself though I know where I am. Moments when I say to myself as feet or car clear a crest or round a bend, I have never seen this place before. Times when some architectural detail on vista that has escaped me these many years says to me that I never did know where I was, even when I was home. – Rebecca Solnit

Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory. – Ed Viesturs

None of your knowledge, your reading, your connections will be of any use here: two legs suffice, and big eyes to see with. Walk alone, across mountains or through forests. You are nobody to the hills or the thick boughs heavy with greenery. You are no longer a role, or a status, not even an individual, but a body, a body that feels sharp stones on the paths, the caress of long grass and the freshness of the wind. When you walk, the world has neither present nor future: nothing but the cycle of mornings and evenings. Always the same thing to do all day: walk. But the walker who marvels while walking (the blue of the rocks in a July evening light, the silvery green of olive leaves at noon, the violet morning hills) has no past, no plans, no experience. He has within him the eternal child. While walking I am but a simple gaze. – Frédéric Gros

You need mountains, long staircases don’t make good hikers. – Amit Kalantri

Hiking—much like drinking—is something that sounds more fun to the uninitiated than it actually is. – Mindy McGinnis

I love writing in the sunshine ’till my head throbs and hiking in the woods ’till my feet hurt. – Kaylee Stepkoski

Hiking Quotes for Couples

You need special shoes for hiking—and a bit of a special soul as well. – Terri Guillemets

The will to succeed is important, but what’s more important is the will to prepare. – Bobby Knight

Nature is not a place to visit. It is home. – Gary Snyder

It’s not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves. – Sir Edmund Hillary

Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step. – Lao Tzu

Hiking Quotes for Instagram

Mountains are freedom. Treat them respectfully. – Conrad Anker

It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. – Confucius

Do something wonderful, people may imitate it. – Albert Schweitzer

May your dreams be larger than mountains and may you have the courage to scale their summits. – Harley King

It is the mountain that has been calling me, and it’s time to answer. – Susan Jagannath

There is always an adventure waiting in the woods. – Katelyn S. Bolds

We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated. – Maya Angelou

Hiking is the only slightly less ugly stepsister of running. – Lindy Hughes

Short Hiking Quotes

The best view comes after the hardest climb. – Unknown

The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot. – Werner Herzog

I did it. I said I’d do it and I’ve done it. – Ben Montgomery

When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on. – Franklin D. Roosevelt

It always seems impossible until it’s done. – Nelson Mandela

Trekking means a travelling experience with a thrilling excitement. – Amit Kalantri

Be a true traveler, don’t be a temporary tourist. – Amit Kalantri

Hike your own hike to health. – Harken Headers

Feeling LOW? – Prajakta Mhadnak

The secret of getting ahead is getting started. – Mark Twain

Next

entry.title: 30+ Cricket Quotes to Motivate You
entry.summary: When it’s time to name the most excited sports then cricket is one of them. Because in cricket one ball can decide which team is going to win. We can’t guess what happen on the second ball. When you are playing in the field with thousands of people …
entry.content:
When it’s time to name the most excited sports then cricket is one of them. Because in cricket one ball can decide which team is going to win. We can’t guess what happen on the second ball. When you are playing in the field with thousands of people crowd around you cheering up, then you have to stay motivate you and keep your focus in the match. Below you can find some cricket quotes to motivate you when match is not on your side. To motivate and inspire you to give your best that you can.

Quotes For Cricket

Cricket as a passion is distinctly contagious.

Cricket to us was more than play, It was a worship in the summer sun. – Edmund Blunden

Actually nobody can be perfect in cricket. Everybody makes mistakes. It is important to learn from your mistakes and correct them. – Kumar Sangakkara

My job is to perform, enjoy cricket and thank God for whatever he has given me. – Suresh Raina

Cricket is battle and service and sport and art. – Douglas Jardine

The true test of any cricketer’s character is how he reacts when the going gets tough, when it’s time to dig in. – Michael Holding

Cricket Love Quotes

To me, Cricket is a simple game. Keep it simple and just go out and play. – Shane Warne

Concentration’s like a shower, you don’t turn it on until you want to bathe. That was cricket for me. – Sir Garfield Sobers

Every morning I woke up, I believed that I could score runs for India. – Sourav Ganguly

Cricket is the most important thing to me, so rest pales in comparison. – Virat Kohli

The joy of doing well as a batsman for your country is much more than that little joy of going for a party and enjoying music. It is a completely different high, and I get high by performances. That’s what I enjoy now. – Virat Kohli

Enjoy the game & Chase your dreams. Dreams do come true. – Sachin Tendulkar

My first bat was shaped of a coconut branch and from that day, all I wanted to do was to be a cricketer. – Brian Lara

Cricket Quotes Funny

I’m convinced things will go much better if the players smile and have some fun on the field, rather than acting like wound-up spring. – Jonty Rhodes

Cricket is the only sport in the world where you are absolutely horrible at something and you still need to go out and do it. – Harsha Bhogle

Cricket Quotes Motivational

You don’t play for the crowd. You play for the country. – Mahendra Singh Dhoni

You dont win or lose the games because of the 11 you select. You win or lose with that those 11 do on the field. – Rahul Dravid

If it’s difficult, I will do it now. If it’s impossible, I will do it presently. – Don Bradman

If you want to do something, achieve something, you can’t be thinking all the time of what you don’t have. – Kapil Dev

First of all, convince yourself that you are the best because the rest of your life is going to go proving this to others. – Wasim Akram

The key to handling pressure is to enjoy it when you’re confronted with it rather than worry about it too much. – Steve Waugh

Never give up; just absolutely never give up. – Shane Warne

Cricket Quotes For Instagram

Every morning I woke up, I believed that I could score runs for India. – Sourav Ganguly

Compromise for your dream but never compromise on your dream. – Imran khan

It is far more than a game, this cricket.

If you’re good enough, you don’t need to say anything to win. – Curtly Ambrose

You can cut the tension with a cricket stump

Cricket Quotes Inspirational

I have failed at times, but I never stop trying. – Rahul Dravid

When people throw stones at you, you turn them into milestones. – Sachin Tendulkar

Some folks will say ‘Oh, Winning ain’t all!’ But I know it is all. At the end of the day no one looks at the loser. So that is why we play to win. – Vivian Richards

A wise man learns by the mistakes of others, a fool by own. – Adam Gilchrist

I have failed more times than I have succeeded, but I never gave up, and will never give up, till my last breath, and that's what cricket has taught me. – Yuvraj Singh

You’re always going to be criticised to a degree. Some people didn’t like Mother Teresa as well. – Brendon McCullum

Next
